17009.quoteText: We may obtain information by automated means such as through browser cookies, pixels, web server logs, web beacons, and other technologies
17009.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

tosdr.case: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting

17010.quoteText:
If you opt out of the IBA Service, the IBA Service will no longer deliver interest-based ads.
Please note, however, that opting out of the IBA Service may not prevent the delivery of generic advertisements to your Smart TV or other devices.
You may also receive interest-based ads from other Samsung devices, apps or services.
Please visit the settings menu on the applicable Samsung device, app or service for information on how to opt out of such ads.
17010.title: You can opt out of targeted advertising

tosdr.case: You can opt out of targeted advertising

17011.quoteText: If you decline to allow the Services to collect, store or share certain information, you may not be able to enjoy full use of all of the features available through the Services
17011.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

tosdr.case: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

17013.quoteText: The Services are not designed to respond to “do not track” signals received from browsers.<strong>
17013.title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

tosdr.case: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.

17014.title: This service may collect, use, and share location data

tosdr.case: This service may collect, use, and share location data

17015.quoteText: We may obtain certain information about you from publicly or commercially-available sources and from third parties who perform services for us.
17015.title: This service gathers information about you through third parties

tosdr.case: Information is gathered about you through third parties
